title: Arianna Huffington, Founder Of The Huffington Post
teaser: Host Jessica Harris speaks with Arianna Huffington, founder of the Huffington Post. Harris also speaks with Skip Bennett, founder of Island Creek Oysters.
contentencoded:
Host Jessica Harris speaks with Arianna Huffington, founder of the Huffington Post. Harris also speaks with Skip Bennett, founder of Island Creek Oysters.
